Configuration

Source (Server Mode)

In Server Mode, you can migrate using either an Exchange Admin profile, or you can enter credentials for an Exchange Server

Outlook Profile

Choose the Outlook Exchange Admin profile. Exchange will prompt for credentials,

Exchange Server

Give the credentials of the Exchange hostname or IP, and the Admin user. A hidden Exchange profile will be created, used to authenticate, and after migration, will be deleted.

Destination

Hostname

Enter the Zimbra Hostname.

Admin Port

Enter the admin port.

Use Secure Connection

Yes for HTTPS, no for HTTP.

Admin ID

Enter the admin user.

Admin Password

Enter the admin password.

Domain

Choose the Zimbra domain.
